name: 2022 REWIND HALL in a nutshell
description:
This is the 2022 hall... but in a nutshell. I got pretty bored of this project so that's why it isn't high quality. Hope you're gonna like it anyway! :) IMPORTANT CONTROLS FOR HIGHER FPS! (I am too bored to optimise the game) 1 - High quality 2 - Medium Quality 3 - Low Quality F11 - Windowed Mode `  - Open console (type "sg.{thething} (value)" / "r.{thething} (value)" but without the ""

EXAMPLE: sg.ShadowQuality 1
                    r.BloomQuality 1)


Fun fact: This is my 22 game
